extendedInfo.description: Become a one-man demolition crew in this fantastic physics-based puzzle game. Use three different types of explosive charges to flatten each building to the ground. Watch the buildings sway and fall with real physics after you detonate your carefully placed explosives. Three difficulty modes and 90 different levels await, with additional bonus objectives for each level. Easy to pick up, but hard to master, Blow Up is sure to provide hours of explosive puzzle fun. Even more, blow the panda up...Key FeaturesRealistic physics engine allows for multiple solutions to the same problem90 challenging levelsThree difficulty settingsDifferent types of explosives and detonation timersAdditional bonus objectives for each levelGlobal high scores across all three difficultiesCM6, please flash the newest google apps

reviews.title: Small but frustrating items
reviews.comment: Some levels declare failure while the poles are still falling covering the screen with the message.  You can\'t see your mistake. You get the idea. Just not smoothed yet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very fun, highly recommended!
reviews.comment: Highly accurate physics simulation makes this game reliably fun to play. In particular, I like how there are many types of explosives and even the base dynamite includes a timer :D
reviews.author: David Hynd

reviews.title: Fun fun fun
reviews.comment: I love games like this.  It reminds me of an indie game on the xbox 360 gerbil physics and gerbil physics.  Plays exactly alike, awesome fun.  90 levels is solid, hopefully they add more over time.  I\'m up to 37 already.  Totally worth the price
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointed.
reviews.comment: Game is great, but a paid game displaying adds? Completely unacceptable and not listed in the description at all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good little game but...
reviews.comment: Almost perfect now.  just switch the back and menu buttons in game for new ICS layout, and it\'s gold
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but dead
reviews.comment: Don\'t bother, it\'s an ignored title. Over a year without an update and a minor bug fix one at that
reviews.author: Zachary Beals

reviews.title: New update has AD!
reviews.comment: Ruined good game- if you pay for an app, you don\'t expect forced in-app ads! Went from 4 stars to 1. Forces you to close an ad window at every level completed. Not the worst but still unacceptable in a paid app. I\'ve bought 2 other of this devs\' games - but not because of these annoying ads.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible game. Spend your money on something else.
reviews.comment: I dont understand! This game should be free. Its not worth it. The physics are upsetting and despite what the other reviews wrote, i dont find this game addicting at all. I regret buying this game. You can get better games for free! If you ask me, this game is made by a bunch of ripoff jews who make you pay for ads. How did it get so many five stars? I must be missing something...
reviews.author: Tikhon Yakovlev

reviews.title: Interesting & fun, but ruined with ads...
reviews.comment: While this is not the most exciting game with the best physics, it is still pretty addictive. It is a fun game although having ads in a paid game kind of ruins it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: gs2
reviews.comment: Great game works great on my galaxy s 2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Completed now what?
reviews.comment: Done all 90 levels then without so much as a congrats or anything, the game simply restarts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I got this during the .10 sale months back. Had I not I would easily pay full price for this game. Lots of fun I played everyday on way to work till I beat it. Please release a level pack or something I need more!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A badly made clone
reviews.comment: This pales in comparison to iOSs Implode. This app is poorly designed with a badly thought out scoring system.  Do not buy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Game is not as bad as some are saying, all I have noticed is that things don\'t always fall in the same place even if you don\'t move the bombs. Good fun non the less.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Such a great physics game
reviews.comment: I bought it, more game play please, maybe different types of velocities/shaped charges  I bought this through the 12 days of Christmas play store sale, even though paying for a game, generally removes the ads, please do so, as you don\'t mention any of this in the description, you should not be taking two Swipes at the same ring, I consider it greedy, pay for it, no ads, free you get ads  I guess more, more, more LoL
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dull
reviews.comment: Very dull and not exciting hardly even a physics game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shock wave physics
reviews.comment: It is cute
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Excellent physics game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This game is a waste of money, which I want back!
reviews.author: Cheryl Barron

reviews.title: Xperia play
reviews.comment: Amazing game. Challenging yet not so hard that it turns me away. I love it. Bought it during the 10cent promotion, I really would pay the full price. Runs wonderfully on the xperia play.
reviews.author: A Google User
